thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com | 9 of 3218
thread.title: PHILLIP CHAPMAN

author: PHILLIP CHAPMAN
title: PHILLIP CHAPMAN
text: I booked online in Australia, although it was easy to book the confirmation was a little cloudy. Wasn't sure if I had the car booking confirmed. When I went into the website I needing my booking number which I did not have, I tried to retrieve it twice with no luck. Once I had that sorted I did get confirmation and the booking is easy to update or cancel. I haven't collected the car yet as my trip is some time away so I can't comment any further
